author: kfogel
msg: Make sure ra_dav doesn't set revisions or wcprops on non-target
This resolves issue #528, and half of issue #530.
(bump_resource): Don't invoke client callbacks unless target path
commit context.  Build a tracking editor, compose it with the main
instead of an apr array header.
(store_path): Removed, we store directly into the hash now.
change_file_prop, apply_textdelta): Store path in hash, don't bother
setting or checking `stored', since this is a hash.
(close_edit): Loop over a hash not an array.
(cleanup_commit): Loop over a hash instead of an array.

author: xela
msg: added some getter/setter methods to access authentification information in the library. adapted the definition of the (status) method to the current definition in svn_client.h
